topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 1.1: Post-Installation Tasks

body.p: After the HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade is installed and running, perform the following tasks.

section.title: Install the KVM Region License
section.p: The servers in the KVM region require a specific license file to be installed. You must download this file from the HP Helion Download Network(HDN).
Before installing the patch, make sure the KVM region controller-0 was properly installed by the HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade installation.

ol.li:
In a browser, navigate to HP Helion Download Network(HDN).
Click Sign In to log in using your account.
After signing in, click the Downloads link in the menu on the left side of the page.
On the Downloads page, locate HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade and click Download.

Download and extract the Helion Carrier Grade 1.1.0 Windriver License patch signature file and the associated signature and checksum files. For information on performing verifications of the download, see the Prerequistues.
Copy the license.lic file to KVM region controller0 node to the /home/wrsroot/ directory.
Restart controller-0 to load the license file.
